item.title: Rey's New Jedi Order Was Secretly Predicted 10 Years Ago By Star Wars' Most Wasted Villain
item.description: One wasted Star Wars villain accurately predicted the Jedi would rise again - though Rey's new Jedi Order wasn't exactly what they had in mind.

item.title: 10 Great Comedy Movies That Save The Best Joke Until Last
item.description: While most comedy movies end with a brief moment of sincerity, there are also those that keep the audience laughing until the very end.

item.title: After 20 Years, You Can Now Watch Henry Cavill's James Bond Audition
item.description: After 20 years since it was recorded, Henry Cavill's audition tape for James Bond has finally surfaced online and is available to watch.
